Package ki306.yarema.lab4.models

Class GasMask

java.lang.Object
ki306.yarema.lab4.models.GasMask
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommanderGasMask
public abstract class GasMask extends Object
Class Lab2YaremaKI306 implements laboratory work â„–4 An abstract class representing a gas mask and allowing various operations with it. The gas mask has a type, a filter, a state (on or off), a usage count, a sealing state, and a cleanliness state.
Since:
version 1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • GasMask

      public GasMask()
      Constructor for creating a gas mask with default values. Sets the mask type to "EN14387," the filter type to "A2B2E2K2," and other initial values.

    • GasMask

      public GasMask(String maskType, String filterType)
      Constructor for creating a gas mask with specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      maskType - The type of the gas mask.
      filterType - The type of the filter.

  • Method Details

    • turnNightVisionOn

      public void turnNightVisionOn()
      Turn on night vision mode for the gas mask.

    • turnNightVisionOff

      public void turnNightVisionOff()
      Turn off night vision mode for the gas mask.

      public void replaceFilter(Filter newFilter)
      Replace the filter of the gas mask with a new one.
      Parameters:
      newFilter - The new filter.
